items.name: Wedding Invitation Suite | Capsule Collection
items.description: This is a luxury textured card which will bring extra elegance to your wedding stationary. The flat card design gives the option for as many additional cards as you require, allowing you to deliver a beautiful message to your guests. Give your invitations the finishing touch with a wax seal.
items.includes: - Addressed Invitation?- Information Card?- RSVP Postcard?- Addressed Envelope?- Envelope Liners
items.optionalIncludes: - Additional Inserts (£1 each)?- Wax Seals (50p each)?- Stickers (£10 per 35)
items.custom: This invitation suite can be customized to suit your style and budget with any combination of inserts. If you would like a personalised wax seal across all your wedding stationary I can offer this for a small additional cost of £15. Please contact me for custom quantities or if you have any questions at all.
items.personalisation: After placing your order I will email over a simple online personalisation form where you can input all your requirements including an option to select any optional extras so I can create your perfect wedding invitations. When this is completed you will be sent a draft, within 3 days, for your approval. Once you are happy this will be sent to the printers.
items.sizes: The invitations are A6 (105 x 148mm), larger sizes (A5 and 5”x7”) are available on request.
items.materials: The invitations are printed on 300gsm luxury textured card, which is recyclable. Other card types are available, such as; silk, cream, pearlised and vellum, please let me know if you have something in mind.
items.alsoAvailable: - Save the Date?- Order of Service?- Menu?- Place Card?- Table Plan?- Table Number/Name Cards?- Signage?- Advice to the Bride and Groom Cards?- Rehearsal Dinner Invitation

items.name: Additional Insert for Wedding Invitation Suite | Capsule Collection
items.description: These additional inserts are designed to go with the wedding invitation suite to allow you to add extra information and continue to deliver a beautiful message to your guests.
items.custom: Please purchase the same quantity as the number of invitations you purchase, if you require multiple additional invitations please purchase this product multiple times altering the personalisation information for what you require on each. Please contact me for custom quantities or if you have any questions at all.
items.personalisation: Please provide the information you require to be included on the card, if you run out of space in the personalisation box please email the details to ArtheyPaperDesigns@hotmail.com and quote your order number. Please also make a note of your name in the personalisation box on both this item and the wedding invitation suite. I will email you with a draft before printing, within 3 days of receiving your personalisation details.
items.sizes: The cards are A6 (105 x 148mm), larger sizes (A5 and 5”x7”) are available on request.
items.materials: The cards are printed on 300gsm luxury textured card, which is recyclable. Other card types are available, such as; silk, cream, pearlised and vellum, please let me know if you have something in mind.
items.alsoAvailable: - Wedding Invitation Suite?- Save the Date?- Order of Service?- Menu?- Place Card?- Table Plan?- Table Number/Name Cards?- Signage?- Advice to the Bride and Groom Cards?- Rehearsal Dinner Invitation

items.description: This luxury card is the perfect way to spoil the bride-to-be! Perfect for any bridal shower or hen do. Give your invitation the finishing touch with a wax seal.

items.name: Bride-to-be Card | Heart
items.description: These cards are a lovely way to let someone know you are thinking of them! The cards are blank inside for your own message. Please contact me if you have any questions at all.
